mods.abstract: Considering that Christian Brothers College taught students ranging from the elementary grades to college level, it mounted several baseball teams in its early years, each with a distinctive uniform. The teams' names were: (First row) the Victors, (Second Row) the Orioles, (Third row) the Pastimes; (Fourth row) C.B.C.; (Fifth row) the Shamrocks; (Sixth row) the Lawrence White Sax.
